name: Tommy Thornton
text: Could not be more pleased with the service at Syla office. My wife and I got our vaccine shots here. Everyone was very professional and punctual. Great job all around!

name: Stephanie Sawyer
text: I highly recommend!!  The Talladega County Health Department should be a model for all other facilities administering COVID vaccines. I called and they answered!  They put my 87 year old mom on a wait list. They called back 4 hours later with an appointment. When we arrived, they were super organized and got us right in. It was very quick, safe and professional!  I highly recommend!!!

name: Lori Hinton
text: If i could give negative stars I would!!! The absolute worst service. I sat in the room to be seen for 1 hour and 45 minutes and no one even came to let me knlw what was going on! And the when i called to reschedule Mazela or whatever her name is was extremely rude and very unhelpful! If you have any other option go with it..

name: Marianne Costes
text: Very attentive care with affordable service. make sure to get there a little early for your appointments

name: Kim Le
text: Got my vaccine here and Mrs. Kathy was such a sweetheart. She made sure I was okay and feeling well after passing out. Didn’t hurt at all, just don’t like needles. The staff was wonderful!

name: Butch Chaffin
text: My wife and I received our first Covid Vaccine at this location. The folks involved in this effort should be commended for their hard work and dedication to this effort. All folks involved deserve praise from those receiving their services. The facility was spotless, the individuals were neat, polite, and the process was very efficient. Thank you to all at this fine location! You are appreciated!

name: Jayne Daughtery
text: My husband and I received our first Covid vaccine at the Jackson County Al health Department today. We were very pleased with how professional and friendly the staff were. They made us feel safe and cared for and I am thankful for the services they provide our county

name: Lynn Stewart
text: Very proficient, professional and friendly.

name: Creeanna Young
text: Very unprofessional! When you have someone walk past you telling you to go back home. Where did you come from before all this BS happened?

name: Shalea154
text: Hard to get anywhere with the HD when they refuse to answer the phone.

name: goth gf
text: this office does not answer the phone. I’ve been calling this place non stop and the phone just rings until someone picks up and hangs up the phone. if I was having a medical emergency, I’d be dead by the time they answer the phone.

name: Crystal Gentle
text: Very pleased south their facility, Covid rules applied and friendly door greeter. Martha was very pleasant and knowledgeable in her department. Bilingual specialist. Turn around time was effectively efficient. Highly recommend.

name: Rachel Wilkes
text: Can’t ever get anyone to answer the phone. It rings & rings & rings & then finally disconnects. Completely ridiculous. Apparently if you want to make an appointment you’re better off just driving all the way up there & doing it in person because you won’t be able to do it over the phone.

name: Rach Burns
text:
I had to go here to get the first of the Moderna vaccines. Everything was well set up, very clean, and there were more than enough seats. (With respect to Covid restrictions)

My wait wasn't long at all and it was pleasant to sit for 20 minutes while we made sure that the vaccine wasn't going to hurt me.

The nurses were very calm and were very able to answer my questions before the stick.
Definitely recommend the location!

name: Chase Bradley
text: Amazing and helping receptionist and the most caring nurse. The only reason I gave them 4stars was due to a bit of a wait. But overall, making more appointments here!

name: Brandon Keener
text: Had to go in to get copies of personal information sent to me. Happened very fast with no problems Great job

name: Tami Werner
text: This is a shout out to Marshall County Health Department! During this terrible Covid time it was so very pleasant to have my shots here! The staff , nurses and volunteers ....every single one of them were so upbeat , pleasant and professional!

name: megan fayee
text: i’ve been calling for a week straight and still have no answer. they don’t know how to return a phone call or pick up the phone for appointments.

name: Tabitha Gonzalez
text: No one seems to know how to answer the phone and when they do they put you on hold and then the line goes dead ,leave a message and never get a call back .

name: Dynice Walker
text: I have called 10 times already and can't get an answer. This is ridiculous.

name: shawn moore
text: Hi, well this isn't so much a review on your office, but there needs to be a better look at chow king restaurant, Albertville, when inspecting. they have roaches crawling on table tops while your eating there, needs to write up and require to clean better, and to do better pest control.

name: memory richey
text: Very efficient and pleasant!

name: Jessica Helton
text: They are usually ok to me, but some are very hateful to certain people.

name: Karina Aviles
text: Medicaid Social worker was in a bad attitude when she called my name and started asking me to loud it looks like she was having some sort of nervous breakdown she didn’t let me explain what was question about my case she didn’t help me at all...

name: Candida Walker
text: Usual Government office

name: Angel Cruz
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent

(Original)
Exelente

name: Tiny King
text: I wish I could give this place 0 stars. I’ve been calling  for 3 days and no one ever picks up. What type of facility do stuff like this. 🙄

name: Chrish Patel
text: Just call now for COVID-19 tasting I don’t know her name but she was very helpful thank you so much

name: Allen Bailey
text: I have been calling all day and tried all extensions and no answer on any. Trying to get COVID vaccine appt. i am over 80 and can’t find anyone to talk with. Just the robot message center.

name: Christine D
text: If I could give this place and the Pelham dmv 0 stars I would. They’re ALWAYS rude when talking to you on the phone and in person. Every single time I come into my appointments way earlier, I’m always there for 2-3 hours, always. Don’t ever think you’re gonna leave on time, you will wait 2-3 just like me with appointments. They act like there’s 2 people running the place , they’re all very lazy when their job is literally health and to help people....

name: Cindi Freeman
text: Very polite. I had a very pleasant experience. This was my first visit to get a pap smear & set up for mammogram. The entire staff were so nice.  It was a little bit of a wait but I was kept informed about how much longer it would be. Apparently there was an influx of walk ins that were sick. I'm 61 and was expecting it to be worse according to others comments  I will definitely be going back.

name: Astrid B
text: Called to make an appt. Took all my information just to tell me they are not offering tests at the time. What a waste.

name: Yass Master
text: New to the area an ran into problems with school transfer, needed to transfer immunization records to Alabama. ALL THE STAFF was so friendly and helpful, EFFICIENT the most pleasant EXPERIENCE at a health department EVER! I dreaded it and then felt so blessed! They informed me he was behind on one shot due to requirements in different states. They did everything they could to squeeze my son in that day so we could make our rescheduled appointment at the school! So thankful! Thank you Shelby County Health Department Staff

name: Jeremy
text: The staff are very friendly and personable. They actually care about their job and the health of their patients. I go every 3 - 6 months to get tested, and although it can be a scary thing, the wonderful people there always motivate me and explain things in great detail. Better than a hospital!!

name: Susana Duran
text: The spanish interpreter Melina has no right to release specific information on me being at the clinic today to her close friends while she is in her work environment. Invasion of privacy! Completely unprofessional!

name: Rachel Vega
text:
Front of house guy has horrible customer service skills! Super rude, angry, old man! I almost left.

Everyone else is nice once you pass the troll at the front desk. I did end up leaving when it got close to hour 3, the day was horrible sitting in there with kids.

name: Wesley Russell
text: Absolute overeach

name: nicole sanders
text: Words cannot be used to describe the difference between jefferson county health dept and Shelby County. Jefferson County is a joke compared to Shelby co. Shelby co is the best health dept I have ever been to period..

name: Amber Holcombe
text: Very clean and ready

name: Robert Ruth
text: Appointments seen before walk ins. Arrived at 8, I was the first walk in. 20+ others that had appointments have been called before me. Its now almost 9. Make an appointment if you want to be seen.

name: Cynthia Lacey
text: The wait is usually not long

name: JR 2020
text: They should close this department .

name: Whitney Washington
text: Terrible in more ways than one!!!!

name: adriana suarez
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent attention!

(Original)
Excelente atención!

name: RWC
text: My husband was able to get a Covid vaccine on 01/18/21. I have to complement the way they had everything organized that day, he didn’t have to wait long and everyone was very gracious and professional! It took a total of 30 minutes for him to get vaccine and then wait 15 minutes to make sure no reaction. They really did a great job. I hope when he goes back for his shot on February 15 everything will work as smoothly!

name: WoodKrafters Construction
text: Been calling for 24 straight working days. No one will answer. Ive tried every option the prerecorded message offers. Are there any other agencies i can use?

name: Chucky Morris
text: Tried to get treatment the place was empty i told the nurse about my symptoms but still wanted me to make an appointment that was six days later smh

name: Tim English
text: Garbage biggest waste of government money I ever seen...

name: Fredricka Hunter
text: I  come to vital records  for documents I needed I got here at 8:15  left around 8:30  the woman  that assist me she was very helpful to me the people that was ahead of me it was three of us in the lobby she got us all out quickly she was very nice and helpful to us all I can honestly said she met all my needs great service I was out with in 15 minute .

name: Christina Johnson
text: My daughters have been going there for regular female check-ups for a few years now. We've never had a problem. The staff are friendly. The nurses & doctors are VERY nice & friendly. They made the young women completely at ease for the examinations

name: Dixie Cook
text: Made it on time for appointment and was seen very quickly and the staff was very helpful and friendly.

name: Judy Nabakowski
text: I'm blasting a review on every bureaucratic website that Alabama has listed. I've been here one year and have had to fight to receive medication, treatment, procedures and food assistance. The theme here in conservative territory seems to be, to inflict further suffering upon the sick, ailing, and/or poverty stricken citizens of this God forsaken state. Alabama may have a good collegiate football team, but that's about all they can brag about. It's no wonder they maintain one of the highest statistics for drug abuse, if I have to endure Alabama much longer, I'll need to turn into a junkie also. This state will allow it's former Governor to fly his mistress around on government funds, but refuses to pay for prescription medication for the sick and ailing. SHAMEFUL! Proud to be a born and raised Floridian out of her element. Alabama could stand to ask Florida about how to run their state.

name: M A
text: Amazing care , friendly staff, took a little bit longer because of the huge number of patients, appointment is always preferred 👍🏻

name: Michael Ellis
text: It has gotten better over the last 5 years of me coming but its still kinda on the slow side.. but better than what it use to be.

name: Jack Newton
text: Will never answer the phone

name: S
text: Rude staff, always busy talking and judging others instead of working or helping. Refuse to treat you as a person only a number, conversation is one sided and the birth control pill offered is dangerously in inadequate with hormones. They will hang up on you constantly and even take the sign in sheet so you are "late".

name: Venus L.C.S
text: Employees are nice and everything's confidential,  building clean and wheelchair accessible

name: Kaysie Marie
text: Very rude and belittling staff. We don't want to be there as much as you don't want to be, but it doesn't mean you have to act so horrible. Never answers phone calls either.

name: Dalt Reed
text: The staff is slow and unprofessional. They do not try to make it quick or simple. To get tested, they make it seem like such a hassle when it should be very quick and easy. We as a community should be trying to get as many people tested as possible but this health department does not even make the impression that they want you to get tested. They are demeaning and unpleasant. They do not try to make you feel welcome or valued for your effort to know your status. This is preposterous in our age when everyone needs to know their status and so many uninformed people are running around with STIs that do not know their status. They need a whole new management system and team set up. I have been sitting here for 45 mins now when the girl in front of me was in and out in 30 because they were brought lunch. I'm the only person here. They could get me in and out in a matter of 10 mins efficiently but instead it takes an hour to two hours every time.

name: Carolyn Sellers
text: The lady in vital records was very rude

name: On The Way Home
text:
Called for 10 mintes trying to get to environmental services option #3. Called back 3x for that option. Outgiing nessage said I was not dialing the right #??? And proceed to give out hearing impaired screeching tones. Called back, pressed 0: voice mail.. No operator. Called back, pressed one, someone answered and hung up on me. Called back option 2: answered and hung up on me.  Very unprofessional. Sad for a facility of this size.
Called 11x's and no option I pushed went to a human

name: Cindy Able
text: Case worker has never answered the phone or returned one call. Applications for services are pending for months for no reason. It is sad that this is how you treat the poorest of the poor who desperately need help. Shame on this health department.

name: Amber Humphries
text: Never answers phone calls.

name: Jessica Gidley
text: Service is terrible it takes normally 3 hours for an appointment when there's only 4 people in the waiting room. I've seen people that work there just standing around talking. And you cannot get anyone on the phone when you call....just horrible

name: Abigail Williams
text: They never answer a phone call.

name: Kimberly Carpenter
text: I've called 10 times in the last hour and have yet to have anyone answer the phone, this is the worst service I've had.

name: Sammy Ott
text: They never answer there phone the only reason i gave them a star is bc it want let me post without one

name: Alexis Tolbert
text: Rude staff, they make it difficult to get in and out on time, and whenever you call up there the lady at the front desk is so rude.

name: Amber McWilliams
text: Horrible at answering the phones ...don't want to receive patients. Just plan slopy work.👎👎👎👎👎👎

name: Eddie Martin
text: The people of st clair county need better representation.  During this pandemic this place has failed us. Time for the folks in charge to clean house .

name: Beth Payne
text: Was tested for Covid and after seven days still have not received results. Was given instructions in writing stating I would get results after five days and if not to call the Saint Clair county health department upon which I did that and they said those instructions were incorrect they do not have my results. This is very disappointing I need my test results to return to work

name: bobby atchley
text: Have tried for the past hour to get in touch with them and they won't or don't answer. I assume they are closed but can't find anything anywhere about it. Was supposed to get 2nd shot today and I don't guess it will happen. This is the most useless health department in the state.

name: Wilford Ownbey
text: Clean. Personal could be Friendlier.

name: Tiffany Stone
text: Wish I could give them 0 stars.. I went up there today told them I was 8 days late and had 2 positive pregnacy test and the lady was very rude to me telling me I was not late and that they were false and that I need to wait till I am 2 weeks late before they will test me.

name: Gabbie Morris
text: Always polite. Sometimes it takes a bit to get to the window if there are alot of people, but that can’t be helped. Otherwise, service is usually quick. Thankful for the services they provide (WIC) that help with the costs of Pediasure for my daughter, who has special needs.

name: Tiffany Mclaughlin
text: I was honestly shocked to see the bad reviews. I've never been treated badly or spoken to rudely. These ladies have always been very nice to me and so sweet to my kids. You have to realize that they are going non stop all day long, so they get tired and frustrated I'm sure. Give them a break and if someone is being rude to you the best thing you can do is be kind to them and smile. They may need that more then anything to help them thru their busy day :)

name: Isabella Martin
text: Takes entirely way to long! Some people have a job to get to and don't have all day to wait on you people to take your sweet time.

name: Marianne Costes
text: If you're open , you're supposed to be WORKING. NOT TURNING AWAY SERVICES and saying "COME BACK TOMORROW."

name: Frog Price
text: Very nice medical services. Also able to get records such as marriage, death and birth certificates.

name: Destiny Evans
text: If i could give this place 0 stars i would.!!!!!! They are rude and they are misrable the whole time they are doing their jobs they are stuck up and just make patients feel like crap.!!!!! They need a whole new staff!!!

name: Britney Jones
text: Always slow, even when they're not packed

name: Britney Jones
text: Always slow, even when it's not packed..

name: Cierra Tiller
text: Wait time is too long

name: Tamara Riggins
text: Its ok

name: Carmen Rocco
text:
(Translated by Google) These people who work at the Health Dept. of Pell City, Al
They are all more racist .... I am a 59 year old woman, and I went to ask
For the Flu Shot they told me to go to CVS ... to put on the Flu Shot.
It takes people in that place to work with love. We are all children of God
No matter where we are from .. They're so rude .....

(Original)
Estas personas que trabajan en el Health Dept. de Pell City,Al
Todas son mas racistas.... Soy una mujer de 59 años,y fui a preguntar
Por la Flu Shot me dijeron que me fuera a CVS....a ponerme la Flu Shot.
Se necesita gente en ese lugar que trabajen con amor. Todos somos hijos de Dios
No importa de donde seamos..They're so rude.....

name: James Price
text: What a breath of fresh air.  Went in and out for vaccine and everyone had such a positive attitude. The process was flawless. This is a perfect example of how to run a business. Don’t know exactly who is in charge but they have a group of people that deserve a lot of recognition. First time since we moved to Alabama that I was proud to live here just knowing how people can work with the public and accomplish the job with a great attitude. Thank you. Jim price. Rainbow city

name: Cathie Scarbrough
text: I am posting for my best friend's parents. They raved about their great experience getting their first COVID vaccines. Marina returned their call and made their appointments. She was so warm and personable. When they arrived at the health department, everything was very organized. The staff were very friendly and delightful. They said that everyone was being treated with warmth, respect, and efficiency. The vaccine itself was expertly done. Even the dismissal after 15 minutes was given by a smiling employee. Thank you for making a potentially difficult experience a very positive one.

name: Rebecca Hart
text: I went to the health department for my first covid vaccine. They were well organized and I zipped right through. The only wait was after when they keep you a certain amount of time tk make sure you don't have a reaction. Parking was easy. A very good experience.

name: Wendy Wallace
text: Had my appointment for my first vaccination shot today. If the front parking area is blocked off..it's okay, park in back, there is an entrance there as well. Have your ID and insurance card ready. I was warmly greeted. I was in and out in under 25 minutes. Once they scan your cards they ask a few questions then you proceed to the next room where you get the vaccination. The ladies were kind and very caring. I didn't feel a thing. The shot is given high on the arm...make sure to dress appropriately. Once you've been vaccinated they give you a card with the type of vaccine and your appointment for your 2nd dose. Don't lose this card. You will need it to get the 2nd dose. They give you a sticker that has the time you were vaccinated on it. Next you move to a 3rd area where you wait for 15 minutes. There was a friendly nurse watching over everyone. Once your 15 minute wait is over you are good to go. Huge thank you to the Etowah Health Department for making this a pleasant experience. Everyone was kind and the entire process was extremely efficient.

name: Ginger Hughes
text: Wonderful kind and caring employees! Easy, great experience.  Thanks to you all at Etowah!❣

name: Darrian Brooks
text: This place is a complete joke. Due to covid they aren’t doing anything but covid stuff so good luck to the parents with out health insurance.

name: Alondra Aguilar
text: Always super quick wait times. Super sweet ladies. Never had a problem when I come in for my birth control:

name: Cliff Heard
text: These ladies were wonderful. Thanks so much for the help.

name: Evelise Martinez-Elrod
text: So I had a wic appointment last month. Told me I had to bring my infant with me to the appointment, but I had all my paperwork with me for my 1st appointment. But they claimed i had to reschedule. So for my 2nd wic appointment i had brung my baby with me, but forgot all my paperwork. She claimed I needed my paper work! So then I had to reschedule again for a third time! This time I went had my baby and all my paperwork. Turns out I waited a long hour to be called and say I dont need my paperwork nor my baby. Then why the hell you say I needed both to begin with. This place is horrible! Dont come here for a wic appointment unless you want to be waiting in the waiting room for a long hour while holding your crying baby. It'll stress you out, I promise.

name: Chai Bracht
text: I waited two long hours to have my intake done and then another hour waiting to be seen by a nurse and ultimately waited another thirty minutes to be given my test results that were taken a month ago. I was never called or updated if my test results were in. Everything here is very backed up and the wait times are ridiculous. Understaffed and the staff that is here is irritated that they are understaffed. Unpleasant experience not worth the free tests they offer... It is unfortunate because many people that need the clinic rely on one income and taking upward of 4 hours for an appointment doesnt look good at a job.

name: Natasha Thomas
text: If you call, plan to be on hold indefinitely. 20 minutes is a long time to hold the phone. After a while, I decided to call back on a different line and voila! someone actually answered without placing me on hold! 😊

name: Rosalynn Mom
text: I found out i was pregnant with my 2nd child down here. The nurse was so nice to me and gave me all my information i needed to see the doctor.

name: Miss La'Heaven Martin
text: Environmental

name: Russell Givens
text: I went here to get a copy of my birth certificate and the lady was very hateful and hateful to others that were being waited on.

name: Barbara Adams
text: I want to thank all the staff for being especially nice and helpful in helping my husband and I get our second Covid vaccine. Special thanks to the nurse supervisor!  Everyone was wonderful!

name: Katie Watson
text: I drove from Mississippi to Alabama (I have been on a work trip) to have a follow up on a surgery I had, they called to confirm my appointment, didn't call to let me know the office would just be closed. No notification whatsoever. I drove almost 3 hours, through tornadic weather to get answers to a colposcopy surgery, pap smear, and birth control ....just to come and see a sign on the door that they were closed. Unacceptable. Now I have to take off work AGAIN after missing an entire day.

name: Tickety Boo
text:
Had an issue with my insurance a week before my baby was due. Was in a panic trying to get on medicaid and figure something out for my daughter to be born.
Went up there and the receptionist was very kind and helpful. When I explained my issue she pointed me to the paper applications and told me to fill one out but to also do one online. She was sympathetic and kind.
The next day (a Wednesday) I was approved for medicaid and called once more explained my issue. The lady I spoke to gave me the direct line to a woman named Joy. Told me to call her ASAP.
I called and explained my situation. I was due in a week, we had an issue with my insurance, but I totally understood if she couldn’t help right now.
She told me “I don’t usually see people ok Wednesday’s. Those are my paperwork days.”
I said that was fine. I could wait till the next day.
“Oh no you can’t, honey! You’re gonna pop!”
I chuckled a bit and she told me she could see me at the end of the day and she would get things worked out.
Get there for my appointment with her at 3 and while she didn’t call me back till about 3:05, I can’t complain about that. It wasn’t an overly long wait and she was seeing me on a day where she usually doesn’t see people.
She handled everything. Was kind and funny, and even when I felt like I wanted to cry from the stress of it all, she was understanding. She even called and remade my doctors appointment (I had canceled it since I couldn’t afford it with my insurance issue).

I will forever be in debt to her for helping us out.

The Health department isn’t perfect. There are going to be long wait times for various reasons. Just because the waiting room is empty, doesn’t mean they don’t have several people on the back. Plus, they work with a very small staff. But, every time I have been (especially when I use to get birth control through them), they have been kind and friendly. They provide a great service to the community.

name: Randy Leverett
text: Marsha, Judy and all the staff could not have been any friendlier. Great people!! Can't say enough for what they do for the citizens of this county. Love you guys

name: BirdSeed 74
text: There is a wait, but the staff has always been friendly to my family.  We only go there for children's shots. The children are always happy with the way they are treated.

name: auburnCHIKA
text: I go there if I have to get a birthday certificate or find out alot of past info they have always been very helpful Thank you for your great service to our community.

name: Josh Knight
text: The woman over Medicaid was very helpful

name: Tricia Lah
text: Worst office EVER! Don’t matter if you go early to get in early to see someone so you could be at work on time or whatever time of the day.. you still would wait over an hour. The women’s staffs are snobs. They don’t care to help you. They’ll be with you when they’re ready to come out. And when they do come to you, they review and and question you in front of other people. No privacy. Lazy staffs. Rude staffs. Just ridiculous amount of waiting time. I don’t understand how an office so empty could take so long to be seen.  Can’t wait to move away from this place.

name: Mandy Shea Riggins
text: Super nice staff here.  MAKE AN APPOINTMENT.  Don't be "that guy."

name: Jeff Brewer
text: If I could leave a zero, I would.  The lady who answers phone calls was absolutely rude for no reason.  The environmental department folks will not give a straight answer on permitting.  I have submitted for permit twice now because they claim they have no record of my previous application.  When I try to show them record of it, they simply say "apply again".  The inefficiency of the operations in this Public Department are deplorable.

name: Joe Ballard
text: This review is for the Jacks on morgan road. We were in there today at 3 pm and the place was filthy. Trash under equipment, on floor, all tables were dirty lobby floor had thash all over it. They were not busy and no one was cleaning anything. All areas that I could see behind the counter the floor had trash all over it. It was worse under the equipment.

name: Megan Danelle
text:
Made a 7:45 appt. Got there 3 mins early the "cop" said wait so I did then was told I have to talk to someone first, which I did when I made the appt. Then called the number to talk to someone & it just rang. Hung up. Called again it was busy. Went to car. Called again & finally got threw now waiting 30 mins after her appt time just for them to tell me when to come in. Why make the appointment if Noone is going to be there to do their job! Changing providers asap!
Also, called to make an appointment early in the morning and was told to go somewhere else so I hung up called the other  but then they needed updated info so called the health department and they said to call on another early morning to get in although I was just speaking to a nurse. These people do not care about anyone.

name: Erika Poikey
text: Literally the worst place ever. You can never get anyone on the phone, they don't give you information you need, everyone is extremely rude and I've been waiting an hour past my appointment time when I arrived a half an hour early, so I've been waiting an hour and a half now.

name: Macarena Matthews
text: I was very happy with the thoroughness and friendliness of the staff and Nurse Practitioner. They were very knowledgeable and even with all the Covid precautions they managed to make it feel not so awkward. I was not confused at all as to the process I should follow when entering the building and I felt as though they are really ensuring the safety and health of each patient that arrives throughout this pandemic.  The NP who saw me was very kind and answered all of my questions and I left feeling like my health was in good hands. Thank you JCDH for all you do in serving our community!!

name: DJ Fikes
text: UAB Highlands no one in line for vaccine but still couldn’t enter w/out appointment-registered w/UAB portal & Health Department but only a confirmation....change protocol to allow shot if criteria is met I’m 69 & if no line  I’d suggest giving shot Why wait for appointment?

name: Caleb Wilson
text: I’ve used WIC services a few times and I always talk to very friendly and helpful people. Everyone I’ve interacted with in the WIC office has been amazing

name: Cari Smith-Pointer
text: The staff has always been friendly and professional to me and my child. I have even had excellent service from nurses and doctors over the phone when I've called with concerns. The only thing I don't like is the TV always playing Cartoon Network in the waiting area. The wait times are long, but they serve a lot of people, and do it very well.  I'm grateful for our health department!

name: John Foster
text: So it's shame that they don't either employ more people, work longer hours, or have some type of special set up to better assist their clients during this pandemic. If I were to go around and spread an STD then they would track me down. But to go on my own as a precautionary measure is now a punishment. It would do them good to remember that any number of disease can easily get out of hand given the opportunity. It's been five days I've tried to make an appointment and I am fed up!

name: Shequonna Campbell
text: Very friendly staff. Easy to make an appointment.

name: Justin Schlumpf
text: My experience is one of highly professional and friendly personnel. I now live out of the area but anytime I'm in town a stop at Bogues is a must. Beyond the wonderful people, the food is delicious. If you haven't already, try the grits!

name: Desided Patino
text: The nurse was very professional and informative overall I had a great experience at the health center.

name: Jim Wilson
text: Good memories of the work and faithful service of John Landrum as an inspector with the health department. Also extremely proud of the compassion and gifted leadership of Dr. Mark Wilson!

name: Kristi Webster
text: Absolutely unbelievable. My mom and I drove two hours to get her appointment at 3pm for her Polio vaccine booster. My mom arrived at the front desk to check-in at 3:04pm. The staff refused to see her and told her they didn't accept anyone after 3pm. My mom looked at her phone and it said 3:04pm. She told them she was only 4 minutes late and we drove two hours to get there. She asked to please let her get the booster. The staff was very rude and refused. They told her she would have to reschedule and come back a different time. There was no one in the waiting room area and they are supposedly open until 4:30pm. We will NEVER go back here!

name: kevin fondren
text: Today is 7-31-2019. I read through these reviews only to be dreading going there today for my childs shots. Everyone was super nice and helpful and very professional also. I dont know what all these other people did to cause them such a bad visit but mine was actually better than a normal doctors visit.

name: Victoria Broadnax
text: After reading the other reviews I was very afraid to come here. But to my surprise my experience was very pleasant, everyone I encountered was nice, helpful and happy. I had no long wait time in the department I went too.

name: Robert Atkins
text: We visited early october and only waited about 10 minutes before we were seen. The staff on the pediatrics side we super nice to me and my daughter..the doctor wasnt very personable but over all not a bad experiance at all. I was kinda skeptic after reading everyones comments,but our our visit went well

name: Liz Taylor
text: Wonderful helpful people.  Thankful for their services

name: K Russell
text: The service is the same as it is in just about every other business office within the Birmingham city limits. Customer Service means nothing, everybody is rude as hell and acting they either didn't want to go to work, or that you're getting on their nerves. These people are not particularly interested in helping the people at all, they just want their check.

name: Pink Pony
text: They are soooo slow getting you on the phone for an appointment. It’s annoying! 🙄

name: Google userk
text: I went in and they greeted me. Good, not too long of a visit. They were nice esp the brown skin lady who took my vital signs lol she was cool. The other lady, not sure of her title, but she helped me

name: Steven Mann
text: Editing in a manner that is more polite but my review still remains unchanged because I have seen no significant effort in the department to improve.Just so clueless. The staff is just so ignorant which is putting that nicely and lacking of common sense so... yes with it': proximity to UAB there is no excuse for this level of rudeness, ignorance , and low quality. I sent a very harsh review a year ago but in truth, after attempting to get information on how to get a food service license, I still don’t see any improvement, my voicemail was never returned, and if it weren’t for the fact that I want to serve food, I would never even mess with them again to begin with. I gave them a second chance and it’s still just as unfriendly and ignorant as it was a year ago. Jefferson County Department of Health needs to improve!! This is far too long to be operating without improving your service, a service that quite frankly is so terrible, that I am just go to another county just to get some decent service from a health department. Like what is it going to take to get this department to improve? Picket signs and pitchforks protesting on their front door? Please, please please, pretend to like your jobs or quit, I don’t care, but your awful attitudes are quite frankly not my problem.

name: Georgia Clements
text: I was able to get my questions answered but I agree with the overwhelming amount of reviews about attitudes. Everyone I encountered was apathetic and not one smile even though I grin like a Cheshire Cat. You would think people would respond to a friendly face and a good disposition in turn! I am thankful I do not have to use their services for my personal healthcare. I suspect they are, like many, stuck in a job they hate.

name: Kristen Gillion
text: If I could give no stars I would. I have went without prenatal care for over two months now and have called multiple times a week and left messages in the OB department. NEVER received a call back not once!!! This is COMPLETELY unacceptable. Placed on hold from the moment someone answers the phone "please hold" and the hold time is ALWAYS 20 minutes minimum. No one seems to care about the job they are doing and relaizing YOU are there to help the public. If you do not want to do your job or help people FIND ANOTHER JOB. You have affected me and my prenatal care and I'm beyond angry about it. I am filing complaints on everyone in this office because of the lack of concern and help they give the people who are needing their assistance. Only time I was on the phone the most with an actual person was when I needed to speak to a manager or supervisor. Then everyone seemed to want to help. Me going without prenatal care because I have to go through the health department first is RIDICULOUS. I WILL NOT stop until I have filed a formal complaint on EVERYONE in the OB department.

name: Jamshed Arslan
text: Found serious mistake (date of birth error) in an important document from them. Be careful, check your documents critically.

name: Ana Lopez
text: I wish I could give zero stars! Staff is unprofessional and rude! They have the worst attitudes I have ever seen in what is suppose to be a professional setting. My review is for their clinic adult health and family planning the doctors and nurses have the worst attitudes and act as if you coming to the doctor is a  nuisance to them! the only doctor who will treat you with respect is Mary Beth the rest of them are horrible I won’t even go into detail on the nightmare experience I had there. This place (at least this part) should be shut down and  investigated they seriously need a new staff! I feel bad for everyone who almost doesn’t have a choice but to go here. They are horrible

name: Traci Groce
text: Called to get some information and was abruptly interrupted! I understand that you may get the same questions 100x a day, but that comes with the territory of the job you signed up for. If you don't like your job, find a new profession!

name: J Bae
text: Highly unprofessional and condescending reception staff. They were unbelievably rude and will blame you for their OWN mistakes. It's no wonder people dread coming here. I wish I could give less than one star, because that's the horrible experience I had. This place gives public health a bad name.

name: Carrie Radice
text: Held for over 50 minutes to be hungg up ok at 5 pm. Jimmie Stephens

name: Heather Michelle Stephens
text: Ew... just a little yucky.

name: Forrest Harmon
text: for all you democrats, please read all the reviews, this is what Government run healthcare looks like.

name: Eric Slaughter
text: Rude, unhelpful, uninformative, unprofessional... this place needs to let go of a lot of ppl or retrain ppl on how to do their jobs properly.

name: Kantonia Coleman
text: My kids use to go to a different clinic of theirs and I transferred them here and their service sucks big time!!! It takes a child dam near a month just to be seen.. this is pathetic

name: Hannah Hatterick
text: The Specialty Clinic staff was very friendly, professional, and efficient. The facility looked very nice and clean throughout.

name: Jamykal Hatcher
text: Service was horrible... i was on hold for 2 hours just to get told they didn’t have any appointment spots

name: Sharita
text: They don't deserve a half a star. Employees are always rude, the wait is ridiculous, and the appointment hotline is a joke.  Called everyday last week for an appointment got lame excuses. I called today and she said no doctor is in for family planning. ....?!? The entire place is a joke.  Never again.

name: V via
text: Called their office 5x each time being placed on hold then the receptionist dropping the call - don't need to point out how unprofessional this is. On 6th call finally got through. Asked about Yellow Fever vaccine pricing and was told that they had a line then proceeded to ask "Do you want an appointment or not?" Receptionist refused to assist. Baffled how it's still OK for Jefferson County Health not to report pricing when asked - we're health customers and we actually do have other options. Needless to say I made the appointment with UAB Travel Clinic instead.

name: Sonya Wallace
text: Don't know if it's because of past reviews or not but they were very kind to me. I went there prepared for the atattitudes but EVERYONE was kind to me.. ...

name: Kelly Bruce
text: I called because I have a question and can't get anyone to answer the phone, it's pathetic. The staff is always rude when you go down there, and no one is helpful. It's not even just the health department, it's this way in every government facility in the city of Birmingham. It's sad and frustrating for the people who live here. Zero Stars!

name: T Jenkins
text: Lol how you get a 2.4 rating lol people are speaking facts though

name: Veronica Leal
text: Don't try to call them with questions. Got transferred and on hold 300X and and up with an option to leave a voice message. Zero stars.

name: Michaela Coffey
text: It took me a week of calling at 7 am to get an appointment, only to speak to an insanely rude person every single day and actually be yelled at through the phone. This place is a joke.

name: Lynnetta Miller
text: Worst place to get your birth certificate.  Customer service is the worst.  Need new staff period

name: Chris Mayer
text: Pleasant, efficient, business like. Easy parking.

name: Esmeralda Pesina
text: Have been calling for a week to get my son a 6 month check up and they kept telling me they weren't doing physical check ups all that week !!! Went ahead and got his 6 month vaccine anyway and the nurse was telling my 6 month old he was a fat so and that he needed to take the baca like a man cause women were gonna make his life miserable anyway and that she was gonna call HR on us for making him get the vaccinations 😡 Needless to say I'm not going back looking for a new pediatrician . I had a great experience at the Obgyn while I was pregnant here but the pediatrics is a joke!

name: Ethanburrroughs 01
text: Takes forever to get a hold of someone and they were supposed to send my fiancé’s prescription to our pharmacist in a fax and still haven’t have been sitting on hold for what feels like an eternity. Terrible service and stink looks from the moment you’re in that place. Will not do anymore business with them !!!!!!

name: Jahina Somo
text: I’ve been currently waiting for 2 hours just to get my birth control refilled I’m genuinely so frustrated that i am not able to get my prescription from a pharmacy I’m never coming back here again

name: Sky Jett
text: Staff is rude and unprofessional. Wait times are beyond ridiculous.

name: Hai2u Official (Slim)
text: Most of the time it's hard to get a parking spot, people in the parking area act insane. For first time visitors it can be confusing on finding where you need to go, the information desk is left empty alot.

name: Brian Bonds
text: Rude. Just rude. No reason to go to work if you're that unhappy,  and it's not everyone else's fault.

name: Csilla Elam
text: I love the people I work with

name: Jercarv Jercarv
text: Graet

name: Cannon Leonard
text: Super rude staff.....staff has changed and refused to let me bring all my kids in the room as i have done in the past....didnt listen to any of my questions and had me in the room waiting for a dr over an hour......

name: Michael Weirich
text: I work for the state and we have to go there to get tested periodically and every time I go it's the worst experience. Just the rudest people.

name: Connor Marchman
text: Service is awful

name: Shanaee Dean
text: Worst place ever and the rudest people they need to b turned in to someone.

name: Marsy
text: Highly unprofessional attitudes from staff and very long wait times! Beware or look elsewhere if possible.

name: Jacob Bryant
text: The most friendly atmosphere

name: Deanita Kimbrough
text: Very rude staff and I don't take well to bad attitudes I will give it in return

name: Geneva Brown
text: It was great the person  answer  the phone  sent me to the department  i needed

name: amanda boyd
text: Their employees are so rude! Something needs to be done about this!!! If the women do not like their job...leave! You are in the customer service field, learn some manners and lose the unnecessary attitudes for NO reason!

name: Cassie Flores
text: Their really rude all the ladies that call you to go back to the little offices they always seem to have a smart mouth .

name: CeCe W
text: Wow the lady that is over immunization health records is very rude, I'm glad I left when I did.

name: Caleb Denitria
text: I recommend they get a new “process” to answering the phones. The wait time is beyond ridiculous and unacceptable. If your phone disconnects, you have to call back & you potentially won’t talk anyone. Their entire process on answering phones, making appointments, and customer service is very low quality.

name: Michel M
text:
(Translated by Google) Having to wait 3 hours to be able to spend with the doctor😤😠 they quote an hour and they spend 3 hours later

(Original)
Tener que esperar 3 horas para poder pasar con la doctora😤😠 citan a una hora y te pasan 3 horas despues

name: Beth Lucas
text: New to AL, I went to the health department to transfer my childrens' immunization records from TN to enroll them in school. After finding missing immunizations, the staff went above and beyond to help me schedule shots the following day, amidst a tight schedule and a holiday, in order for my children to start school on time. These ladies went out of their way to make sure I was taken care of and I'm so thankful. Keep up the great work, we will be back!!!

name: Angie Woods Elmore
text: Great people work here. They make the experience easy.

name: A C
text: Everyone has a positive bed-side manner! They are upfront & honest. They can answer any questions you may have. This facility is fantastic! Make an appointment & be on time because; these ladies work hard to get you in & out quickly.

name: Amber Bunch
text: Melinda in the birth/death certificates department was extremely helpful and very polite. The state could really use more people like her working for them! Thanks!

name: jeannette williams
text: Everyone is friendly and helpful!

name: Kristin Marie
text: Very helpful

name: Shandi Stewart
text: Friendly helpful nice speedy

name: kingplay57 pewdiepie
text: Wow nice.

name: Emily Pruitt
text: These people are always so kind and its always very clean!!❤️

name: stephanie holley
text: Always helpful! Very nice, could explain things a tad better but a great experience overall!

name: Al Cotton
text: I reported an illegally installed septic tank where raw sewage is being dumped on the ground behind a trailer. The smell of raw sewage is overwhelming any time the wind blows from that direction. We are three tenths of a mile from the trailer. The report was over a month ago and to date nothing has been done.

name: Brandy Moncibais
text: Extremely slow very poor planning. The folks are nice but the process is not effective.

name: Quinterris Rivers
text: They are very slow if your appointment is at 8 u will be there until 11 or 12 because they just sit and gossip about other stuff

name: Shalonda Timmons
text: Literally takes them 7 weeks to process a application!!.....Thats just ridiculous.

name: Ashley Slayton
text: Very horrible place to visit the lady at the front desk is ridiculous

name: Joanne Gilliland
text: Typical health department

name: Efia
text: No hours of operation

name: 최경실
text:
(Translated by Google) The staff did their best to the children,
It was very kind.

(Original)
직원들은 아이들에게 최선을 다했고,
아주 친절했다.

name: Antonio Henderson
text: Better off going to the ER... This is not even worth it...at least you can get in and out the same day!

name: Jovon Covington
text: Wait From 7:00- 7:47 For Somebody Too Answer Only Too Tell My TheY Full Of Appointments. This Happen 3 Days In A Row. Ik We In A Pandemic But Y’all Only Answering The Phone. We Need Different Department Numbers Asap

name: Amanda Scott
text: I had an appointment, everything went smoothly, all of the staff were so nice and helpful, good experience and good communication.

name: Kendrick C
text: You guys might want to change you all hours because I called up there today about trying to obtain a death certificate. So the first call was placed around 3:40 - 3:50 pm to which I was directed to an automated system which asked me to "press 1 to speak with a representative". So I complied, and waited till 4:05- 4:10 pm after the automated service kept saying I was next in line. It said that for about 15-20 mins. So I hang up and call back and guess what, transferred back to an automated service, to be placed on hold again and now I'm the third in line for another 20 mins. Do better.

name: Monika Jackson
text: No one ever answers the phone. I was on hold for an hour twice trying to schedule appointment.

name: Jacob Mcnair
text: Is

name: Amber Morgan
text: Rudest people I have encountered since moving to Auburn. Had a confirmation for COVID-19 vaccine. They said I wasn't in their system and that I must have FAKED the confirmation! Refused to give me the vaccine that I had been waiting weeks to get. These people are in need of some serious customer service skills training.

name: Robert C
text:
They treated me very professionally despite being busy at the time of my visit. I went in needing a birth certificate for my son and within 30 minutes I'm out the door with one. There was plenty of waiting area and the forms needed were easy to fill out.

If you found this review helpful please give it a like!👍

name: Amy Wilson
text: I have had nothing but good experiences, whether calling in or going up to the office. The ladies are always friendly and have no problem answering the questions I have had. They were patient and thorough. This health department is much better than others I have been to.

name: Crystal Jones
text: We should all write Senator Tommy Tuberville. They will get right then, or lose their job.  There are too many people that need a job to be wasting it on lazy people who think we owe them a free ride.  Write people! It is the only way to clean the place up and not be treated like dirt.

name: Shamika A
text: This was my first time here and I had a pleasant experience. Everyone was nice and I was in a out in about an hour.

name: Brandii Ambus
text: Worst experience ever! UNPROFESSIONAL!

name: Emilee Engledow
text:
I have never met such a rude staff of employees. When I had to go in today the lady at the front hardly looked up from her phone because she was playing some game like candy crush. She practically threw a pen at me and she was not wearing a mask. Yesterday when I tried to come in they were just as rude. I work in customer service so I try to be understanding but this staff is very unprofessional, lazy, and shows a lack of customer service that might be the worst I have ever come into contact with (that isn’t even an exaggeration). Also, I had to sit in my car for an hour and wait on them to do a vaccine transfer for my little brother’s new school since we just moved here (they were not busy). I had such a terrible experience both times at the Lee County Health Department that I took the time to write this review (my first negative google review ever) because of how bad it was.

**The only positive remark I will make is the lady that brought my paperwork back after my hour long wait in my car said sorry about how long it took and told me to have a nice day (this lady was wearing a mask).

name: Julie Dill
text: They lost my appointment I had been waiting for for over a month. They had nothing to say but you can call and make and appointment 2 months out. Absolutely ridiculous!!! This is what our city has for something that people rely on to have for a lot of different program and doctors. Something needs to be done.

name: Skip Iron
text:
A real pain to deal with or work with. They were generally rude with only occasional attempts at what the rest of society terms manners and propriety.

They also seem to have a very poor understanding of federal and other healthcare laws and regulations. I hope I never have to deal with them again.

name: Kayla Fitzgerald
text: They offer more care than most folks realize. Free cancer screening! Truly free.

name: Cameron Greco
text: A terrible establishment, plan to waste your whole day here if you need to go. Every time (3-4 times) I have came here and waited 3-4 hours when I have an appointment to see the doctor. One time the doctor asked me to undress and I waited on the table naked for 20 minutes for her to return. Very unprofessional.

name: BOBO Channel
text: They weren't willing to listen to my wishes. I couldn't understand their answer no matter how  they tried to explain. It was ridiculous !!

name: Zaria Chambers
text: They N E V E R answer the damn phone, it’s ridiculous,

name: Slomo
text: Why can appointments only be made at 7:30am specifically? It always feels like the people that work here hate to be bothered with you as well.

name: datboi Craig
text: Very unorganized

name: Alyssa Golden
text: You can never get them to answer

name: April Clay
text: It is much less crowded
